system.effect:
Character gains +10 to Command, Commerce, Deception, and Intimidation Skill Tests against those with a lower Strength or Willpower Characteristic than themselves. They also suffer -10 to Charm Skills with such individuals.
These effects also apply in Social Conflicts.
